sources.title: Iron Warrior (1987) Born of a sorceress... sired by a dragon... baptized in blood! 4K
sources.description:
Who will rid the world of Trogar? Born of evil sorcery. Half man - Half spirit. Total exterminator!
Ator and his brother are separated as children by the evil witch Phaedra. 18 years later she takes over the kingdom with the help of a masked warrior. Ator and Princess Janna prepare for the final fight.

Original title: Iron Warrior (1987)  AKA: Echos of Wizardry

Directors: Alfonso Brescia, Ovidio G. Assonitis
Writers: Steven Luotto, Alfonso Brescia
Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Romance

Main Cast:
Miles O'Keeffe - Ator
Savina Gersak - Princess Janna
Elisabeth Kaza - Phoedra
Tiziana Altieri - Young Phoedra
Anna Cachia - Seductress 
Iris Peynado - Deeva
Tim Lane - King
Franco Daddi - Trogar
Josie Coppini - King Impostor

Release date: January 9, 1987 (USA)


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbG3qWIWu2HZkdI6nJCWaqj

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Ator and his brother Trogar are separated as children by the evil witch Phaedra who gets banned for this. 18 years later she returns, taking over the kingdom with the help of the undefeatable masked warrior. Princess Janna is able to escape the slaughter of her family and joins Ator in fighting the witch. On the mystic island of Stygian they search for a golden chest and prepare for the final fight against her and the Iron Warrior.
metadata.Actors: Miles O'Keeffe, Savina Gersak, Elisabeth Kaza
